channel.title: myself on D00k
channel.description: Recent content in myself on D00k

item.title: Now
item.description: March 2022 ∙ Learning digital art using Krita. ∙ Doing a big clean-out of everything I own. ∙ Hopefully picking up where I left off learning the Linux Command Line. ∙ Heading on my first break away in years, hoping to get some nice shots in a new environment. What’s Playing? ∙ Vibing to Japanese 80’s City Pop music. ∙ Re-watching Full Metal Alchemist Brotherhood. ∙ Playing Pokemon Legends Arceus.

item.title: Year Review 2021
item.description: At a glance, this year has been a bit of a writeoff for me. I was diagnosed with Crohn’s earlier in the year and I’ve spent most of the rest recovering, going so far to drop out of college on medical leave. My high risk to covid has left me isolating in my home for a large amount of time as well. Both have hampered my ability to do much physical things, but allowed me to read and research more than I could before.
